definition: to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine

sentences.english: i'm so happy with you in this starry night.
sentences.chinese: 在这繁星闪灼的夜晚，跟你在一路很是欢愉。

sentences.english: The honor forever shining in our eyes.
sentences.chinese: 眼里始终有荣耀在闪灼。

sentences.english: A smile of triumph lit up her face.
sentences.chinese: 她的脸上闪灼着成功的浅笑。

definition: to dazzle/to brighten up (a room etc)
a glimmer/twinkling (of stars, phosphorescence, candlelight)/flickering light
to radiate/to shine/glitter of light/a glint
to flicker/to flash on and off/to brighten and fade
bare and bald (of mountains)/bright and brilliant/fat and sleek
intermittent/now you see it, now you don't
